benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/admin/payments/{paymentId}/transactions/{paymentTransactionId} - Update existing paymentTransaction and associated payment state

covered: Valid PUT requests update both payment transaction and associated state (TC01, TC02, TC23, TC14, TC15).
Invalid inputs and error handling are validated: missing headers (TC03), invalid UUID formats (TC04/TC05), missing body (TC09), malformed JSON (TC10), invalid state data (TC08).
Supporting edge cases: extra/unsupported fields ignored (TC13), optional headers variations (TC24, TC26).
Security tests: SQL Injection (TC18) and XSS (TC19).
Resilience and performance: timeouts (TC16), degraded dependencies (TC22), high load (TC21), regression (TC20).
Query parameters handling: extra/unsupported query parameters (TC25).
gaps: No test for 403 Forbidden when an authenticated user lacks necessary privileges.
No explicit test for 500 Internal Server Error (server failure).
No test for missing required fields within the AdminPayment payload (beyond missing body).
recommendations: Add a test for 403 Forbidden to cover authorization with insufficient privileges.
Add an explicit 500 Internal Server Error scenario to verify server-side failure handling.
Introduce rate-limiting/throttling tests to validate resilience under bursty traffic.
Add caching-related tests (ETag/Cache-Control) for PUT responses where applicable.
Include a test verifying behavior when required fields inside AdminPayment payload are missing (beyond missing body).
